an6.82:4.1: “Mendicants, someone with six qualities is cast down to hell.
an6.82:4.3: They kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, and lie. And they’re greedy and impudent.
an6.82:4.4: Someone with these six qualities is cast down to hell.
an6.82:5.1: Someone with six qualities is raised up to heaven.
an6.82:5.3: They don’t kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, or lie. And they’re not greedy or impudent.
an6.82:5.4: Someone with these six qualities is raised up to heaven.”
